```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggpubr)

cafe <- read_tsv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/IAA-Faculty/statistical_foundations/master/cafeteria")
```
```{r}
mod.1 <- lm(Sales~., data = cafe)
ggqqplot(mod.1$residuals)
ggplot(mod.1, aes(.fitted, .resid)) +
  geom_jitter()
```
```{r}
AIC(lm(Sales~Dispensers, data = cafe))
AIC(lm(Sales~Dispensers + I(Dispensers^2), data = cafe)) # Best
AIC(lm(Sales~Dispensers + I(Dispensers^2) + I(Dispensers^3), data = cafe))
AIC(lm(Sales~Dispensers + I(Dispensers^2) + I(Dispensers^3) + I(Dispensers^4), data = cafe))

```
```{r}
best.mod <- lm(Sales~Dispensers + I(Dispensers^2), data = cafe)
ggqqplot(best.mod$residuals)
ggplot(best.mod, aes(.fitted, .resid)) +
  geom_jitter()
```
